title: ‘120 Bahadur’ first reviews: Farhan, Raashii's war drama hailed as ‘powerful’
description: Farhan Akhtar's war drama '120 Bahadur' releases tomorrow, honouring the heroic 1962 Rezang La stand. Early reviews laud its powerful cinematography, engaging score, and stunning visuals, with viewers deeply moved by the soldiers' bravery. The film, inspired by true events, depicts 120 Indian soldiers against 3,000 Chinese troops, showcasing extraordinary courage and sacrifice. Amitabh Bachchan lends his voice as narrator.

title: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella to employees: Must rapidly rethink AI; calls shift 'critical'
description: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella has appointed Rolf Harms, the executive behind the influential 2010 "Economics of the Cloud" white paper, to help rethink Microsoft's business model for the AI era. In an internal memo obtained by Business Insider, Nadella emphasized the need to rapidly transform the company's approach to AI economics, similar to its cloud computing pivot 15 years ago. The move reflects Nadella's concerns about Microsoft's survival in the AI era, as he warned employees that some of the company's biggest businesses may become irrelevant without fundamental changes.

title: Bengaluru heist: Gang posing as ‘RBI officials’ loot Rs 7cr from cash van in 30 mins — how the drama unfolded
description: Five to six miscreants, posing as RBI officials, executed a daring daylight dacoity in Bengaluru, looting Rs 7.1 crore from an armoured cash van. The well-scripted incident involved blocking the van, deceiving its staff, and making off with the cash boxes under the guise of an inspection.

description: Nasa on Wednesday released long-delayed images of Comet 3I/ATLAS, an interstellar visitor that stayed hidden during the 43-day US government shutdown, sparking online claims of alien links. Senior officials dismissed the rumours, saying it behaves like a normal comet. The new photographs from multiple spacecraft will help build a clearer 3D view before it exits deep space.

title: Nagpur robbery: Manager loots own bank of Rs 1.58cr to clear debt; held within 24 hours
description: A bank manager orchestrated a daring solo heist. Mayur Nepale stole over Rs1.5 crore from his bank's strongroom. He was driven by crippling gambling debts. Nepale attempted to stage the crime as an external burglary. However, CCTV footage captured him arriving on his scooter. Police quickly identified and arrested him. Assets worth over Rs1 crore were recovered.

Canada’s study, work permit delays deepen for Indian applicants despite real-time tracking shift
description: Indian applicants are seeing mixed trends in Canada’s latest visa processing updates. Study permits from India now take around four weeks, but in-Canada extensions still stretch to 12 weeks. Work permits remain steady at ten weeks, while extensions inside Canada face delays of nearly eight months. IRCC’s real-time tracking boosts transparency but offers little relief from uneven processing timelines.

title: Dhruv Rathee slams ‘Dhurandhar’ trailer; Ranvir Shorey calls him ‘fake’
description: The trailer for Ranveer Singh's film 'Dhurandhar' has ignited a debate. Creator Dhruv Rathee slammed its extreme violence, comparing it to ISIS beheadings. This drew a sharp response from actor Ranvir Shorey. The exchange escalated online, touching on censorship and public figures' opinions. Netizens recalled Rathee's past praise for 'Gangs of Wasseypur', prompting his admission of changing views.

title: Video sparks allegations of Trevon Diggs’ role in violent elevator encounter
description: Surveillance footage has surfaced regarding an elevator altercation in Los Angeles, allegedly involving individuals connected to the Diggs family. While Trevon Diggs isn't officially charged, a civil suit names him, and his brother Darez has faced legal action. The victim claims robbery and assault, sparking intense scrutiny.

title: Taylor Swift’s new song sparks Joe Alwyn breakup buzz, not Travis Kelce
description: Taylor Swift's new song, 'The Fate of Ophelia,' is fueling fan theories linking it to her breakup with Joe Alwyn.  Swifties interpret lyrics about rescue and rebirth as a nod to her current relationship, contrasting it with her past. The track is seen as Taylor Swift reclaiming her narrative, transforming heartbreak into art.

title: Tech firm whose founder beat Musk as world's richest for a day loses 30% market value
description: Larry Ellison briefly surpassed Elon Musk in wealth after Oracle's stock surged on a massive OpenAI cloud deal. However, Oracle's value has since plummeted, erasing those gains and pushing Ellison down the rankings. Musk has since reclaimed his top spot, driven by strong performance in Tesla and SpaceX.
